comment.author: 42826854@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Heritage Key, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 41997949@N03
comment._content: I think this is the Trajan's kiosk

comment.author: 95619641@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/klasky] You're right.  It is Trajan's Kiosk, for Roman Emperor Trajan,  on Agilika Island in Aswan, Egypt.  It used to be on Philae Island until the lower dam made it necessary to move it to higher ground.
